package.name: linux_headers
package.unpack: major=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $1}' ` minor=` echo $PKGVERSION | awk -F '.' '{print $2}' ` unxz -c ${SRCDIR}/linux-${major}.${minor}.tar.xz | tar xf -
package.install: cd linux-${PKGVERSION} make INSTALL_HDR_PATH=dest headers_install find dest/include \( -name .install -o -name ..install.cmd \) -delete mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/include cp -rv dest/include/* ${TGTDIR}/usr/include
